description: Checklist agent: create checklist, report progress, update items

steps.userQuery: Create an ORR checklist for Project Epsilon with items: monitoring configured, runbook reviewed, load testing done, rollback tested, security review done.
steps.description: Checklist agent creates a checklist with items

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll create an ORR checklist for the project.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_checklist", "args": {"projectId": "project-epsilon", "name": "ORR - Project Epsilon", "items": [{"text": "Monitoring configured"}, {"text": "Runbook reviewed"}, {"text": "Load testing done"}, {"text": "Rollback tested"}, {"text": "Security review done"}]}}
</tool_call>
ORR checklist created with 5 items. All items start unchecked and in IN_PROGRESS status.
{"pass": true, "summary": "Checklist agent created ORR checklist with 5 items"}

steps.userQuery: Report checklist progress for Project Epsilon.

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll check the progress on all checklists.

<tool_call>
{"name": "checklist_progress", "args": {"projectId": "project-epsilon"}}
</tool_call>

Progress report for Project Epsilon:
- ORR checklist: 0/5 items complete (0%)
- All items are unassigned — recommend assigning owners
{"pass": true, "summary": "Checklist agent reported progress with 0/5 items complete"}
